text: Orlando Jones (born April 10, 1968) is an American comedian and actor. He was born in Toulminville, Alabama. Jones is known for being one of the original cast members of the sketch comedy series MADtv and for his role as the 7 Up spokesman from 1999 to 2002. He scored his first Hollywood job in 1987, writing for the NBC comedy A Different World, on which he had a small guest role in the season five finale. During 1991â€“92, Jones penned the FOX series Roc and, in 1993, he co-produced The Sinbad Show. He also made a brief appearance on the FOX sitcom Herman's Head in 1992. == Other websites == * Category:1968 births Category:African-American actors Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Living people Category:Actors from Alabama Category:Actors from South Carolina Category:Comedians from Alabama
title: Orlando Jones
